I'd highly recommend "Blow Out" for you! It's a gripping thriller about a movie sound recordist who stumbles upon evidence of a murder, which puts him in grave danger. The film stars Nancy Allen and Dennis Franz, both delivering captivating performances. If you enjoy mysteries with a touch of suspense, I think this one will be right up your alley!

As for something more fantastical, "In the Woods" might also interest you. This film offers an intriguing insight into the lives of monsters living in an urban forest. It's an entertaining documentary-style exploration, narrated by a monster boy named Max and his best friend P., who captures their unscripted story on camera.
